item.title: STEMCon
item.description: A conference to expose high school students to various STEM fields, including robotics, biomedical engineering, and game design.

item.title: WiE High School Mentorship Program
item.description: An inaugural high school mentorship program for female* grade 11-12 students interested in engineering.
